amendment.description: To change the requirements for naturalization through service in the Armed Forces of the United States, to extend naturalization benefits to members of the Selected Reserve of the Ready Reserve of a reserve component of the Armed Forces, to extend posthumous benefits to surviving spouses, children, and parents, and for other purposes.

vote.text: Amendment SA 847 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.

action.text: Amendment SA 847 proposed by Senator Kennedy. (consideration: CR S7280-7283) To change the requirements for naturalization through service in the Armed Forces of the United States, to extend naturalization benefits to members of the Selected Reserve of the Ready Reserve of a reserve component of the Armed Forces, to extend posthumous benefits to surviving spouses, children, and parents, and for other purposes.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 847 proposed by Senator Kennedy.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 847 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.
